description: Task hierarchy and resource scheduling components for ASP .NET and .NET 4/2.0, targeting HTML5 browsers: Gantt Chart, Schedule Chart, Load Chart; Network Diagram. Main features: Interactive task hierarchy management and resource scheduling charts; Task bars and dependency lines supporting drag and drop operations; Working time, scales, and zoom level customization; Project baseline visualization; Rich user experience, customizable appearance, culture awareness; Modern UI and Aero theme support; Automatic postback handling, and server side item property change notifications.
releaseNotes: New features: cost computing, material resource quantities, individual task item schedules, task parts.
summary: Task hierarchy and resource scheduling components for ASP .NET and .NET 4/2.0, targeting HTML5 browsers: Gantt Chart, Schedule Chart, Load Chart; Network Diagram.
title: DlhSoft Gantt Chart Web Library for ASP .NET
